languages.text: "После того, первого раза... я постепенно привыкаю к странствиям за вуаль. Только мон-кай могла прийти в голову мысль странствовать по галактике таким самоубийственным образом. Но знаешь что? Это нечто новое. И будоражащее". {n}Маражай взмахивает ладонью.{/n} "В любом случае я теперь знаю, с чем имею дело. А следовательно, найду способ этому противостоять".

"Since the first time, I have been slowly acclimatising to voyaging through the veil. Only mon-keigh could have conceived of such a suicidal method of galactic travel. However, it is novel. And exhilarating." {n}Marazhai waves a hand.{/n} "At least now I know what I am facing. And consequently, I will find a way to withstand it."
languages.original_text: "После того, первого раза... я постепенно привыкаю к странствиям за вуаль. Только мон-кай могла прийти в голову мысль странствовать по галактике таким самоубийственным образом. Но знаешь что? Это нечто новое. И будоражащее". {n}Маражай взмахивает ладонью.{/n} "В любом случае я теперь знаю, с чем имею дело. А следовательно, найду способ этому противостоять".

And exhilarating." {n}Marazhai waves a hand.{/n} "At least now I know what I am facing. And consequently, I will find a way to withstand it."

"Since the first time, I have been slowly acclimatising to voyaging through the veil. Only mon-keigh could have conceived of such a suicidal method of galactic travel. However, it is novel. And exhilarating." {n}Marazhai waves a hand.{/n} "At least now I know what I am facing. And consequently, I will find a way to withstand it."

languages.text: «Desde la primera vez, me he estado aclimatando a viajar a través del velo. Solo a los mon-keigh se les habría ocurrido una forma tan suicida de viajar por la galaxia. Sin embargo, es novedosa. Y emocionante». {n}Marazhai gesticula.{/n} «Por lo menos ahora sé a lo que me enfrento. Y, por lo tanto, encontraré el modo de resistirlo».
languages.original_text: "Since the first time, I have been slowly acclimatising to voyaging through the veil. Only mon-keigh could have conceived of such a suicidal method of galactic travel. However, it is novel. And exhilarating." {n}Marazhai waves a hand.{/n} "At least now I know what I am facing. And consequently, I will find a way to withstand it."

traits.locale_text: «Desde la primera vez, me he estado aclimatando a viajar a través del velo. Solo a los mon-keigh se les habría ocurrido una forma tan suicida de viajar por la galaxia. Sin embargo, es novedosa. Y emocionante». {n}Marazhai gesticula.{/n} «Por lo menos ahora sé a lo que me enfrento. Y, por lo tanto, encontraré el modo de resistirlo».

languages.text: “自从第一次穿越结束之后，我就慢慢地适应了穿越面纱的航行。恐怕只有猴子才能想出这种自杀式的做法跨越银河系。不过，这很新奇，而且让我兴奋。”{n}玛拉斋挥了挥手。{/n}“至少现在，我已经知道我会面对什么情况，我会想办法忍受的。”
languages.original_text: "Since the first time, I have been slowly acclimatising to voyaging through the veil. Only mon-keigh could have conceived of such a suicidal method of galactic travel. However, it is novel. And exhilarating." {n}Marazhai waves a hand.{/n} "At least now I know what I am facing. And consequently, I will find a way to withstand it."

traits.locale_text: “自从第一次穿越结束之后，我就慢慢地适应了穿越面纱的航行。恐怕只有猴子才能想出这种自杀式的做法跨越银河系。不过，这很新奇，而且让我兴奋。”{n}玛拉斋挥了挥手。{/n}“至少现在，我已经知道我会面对什么情况，我会想办法忍受的。”

languages.text: 「俺はヴェールの中を進むことに徐々に慣れてきた。このような自殺行為的な銀河旅行方法を思いついたのはモン＝ケイくらいだろう。だが斬新かつ爽快だ」{n}マラズハイが両手を振る。{/n}「少なくとも今俺は何に直面しているのかが分かっている。したがって、それに抵抗する方法を見つけよう」
languages.original_text: "Since the first time, I have been slowly acclimatising to voyaging through the veil. Only mon-keigh could have conceived of such a suicidal method of galactic travel. However, it is novel. And exhilarating." {n}Marazhai waves a hand.{/n} "At least now I know what I am facing. And consequently, I will find a way to withstand it."

traits.locale_text: 「俺はヴェールの中を進むことに徐々に慣れてきた。このような自殺行為的な銀河旅行方法を思いついたのはモン＝ケイくらいだろう。だが斬新かつ爽快だ」{n}マラズハイが両手を振る。{/n}「少なくとも今俺は何に直面しているのかが分かっている。したがって、それに抵抗する方法を見つけよう」

languages.text: « Depuis la première fois, je me suis lentement acclimaté à la navigation à travers le voile. Seuls les mon-keigh ont pu inventer un moyen de transport galactique aussi suicidaire. Cela étant dit, j'aime la nouveauté et cette découverte me ravit. {n}Marazhai esquisse un geste désinvolte.{/n} Au moins, je sais à quoi m'en tenir, maintenant. Et par conséquent, je trouverai un moyen de tenir le coup. »
languages.original_text: "Since the first time, I have been slowly acclimatising to voyaging through the veil. Only mon-keigh could have conceived of such a suicidal method of galactic travel. However, it is novel. And exhilarating." {n}Marazhai waves a hand.{/n} "At least now I know what I am facing. And consequently, I will find a way to withstand it."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis la première fois, je me suis lentement acclimaté à la navigation à travers le voile. Seuls les mon-keigh ont pu inventer un moyen de transport galactique aussi suicidaire. Cela étant dit, j'aime la nouveauté et cette découverte me ravit. {n}Marazhai esquisse un geste désinvolte.{/n} Au moins, je sais à quoi m'en tenir, maintenant. Et par conséquent, je trouverai un moyen de tenir le coup. »

languages.text: "Ich gewöhne mich seit dem ersten Mal langsam daran, durch den Schleier zu reisen. Nur Chem-Pan-Sey könnten sich eine solch selbstmörderische Form des galaktischen Reisens einfallen lassen. Aber es ist mal etwas Neues. Und es ist berauschend." {n}Marazhai winkt ab.{/n} "Zumindest weiß ich nun, womit ich es zu tun habe. Und daher werde ich auch einen Weg finden, es zu überstehen."
languages.original_text: "Since the first time, I have been slowly acclimatising to voyaging through the veil. Only mon-keigh could have conceived of such a suicidal method of galactic travel. However, it is novel. And exhilarating." {n}Marazhai waves a hand.{/n} "At least now I know what I am facing. And consequently, I will find a way to withstand it."

Und es ist berauschend." {n}Marazhai winkt ab.{/n} "Zumindest weiß ich nun, womit ich es zu tun habe. Und daher werde ich auch einen Weg finden, es zu überstehen."

However, it is novel. And exhilarating." {n}Marazhai waves a hand.{/n} "At least now I know what I am facing. And consequently, I will find a way to withstand it."

languages.text: "Örtüden her geçişimizde biraz daha alışıyorum. Galaktik seyahat için böyle deli saçması bir yöntem de yalnızca mon-keighlerin aklına gelirdi zaten. Yine de değişik ve heyecan verici buluyorum." {n}Marazhai, bir elini sallıyor.{/n} "En azından artık neyle baş edeceğimi biliyorum. Zaman içinde katlanmasını da öğreneceğim."
languages.original_text: "Since the first time, I have been slowly acclimatising to voyaging through the veil. Only mon-keigh could have conceived of such a suicidal method of galactic travel. However, it is novel. And exhilarating." {n}Marazhai waves a hand.{/n} "At least now I know what I am facing. And consequently, I will find a way to withstand it."
